channel.title: How can i make a Client?
channel.description: Are there any tutorials how i can make a Client for my server..Becouse im bored from oppening WebClients like MoparScape,Silab (loading is slow on my PC) and dont give me a TUTORIAL with Visual Basic in it.(my computer is slow and cant power it ;D )

item.title: How can i make a Client?
item.dc:creator: @Andy89898 Andy89898
item.description:
@Andy89898 wrote:

lol yh i know im just saying but if you want to make a client search it! coz when i was new i found out from Scarecrows
well one thing u need first is a source there are loads out there Galkons client base is proably the best starter source

Read full topic

item.title: How can i make a Client?
item.dc:creator: @bmv_1994 bmv_1994
item.description:
@bmv_1994 wrote:

1.Torgue` i want to make a simple client no Extra’s just that i could play…dont need this junk which they get here…Almost everything on this servers dont work(i tryed more of them)…
2.Any tutorial how to make client on Java,lol? I saw somewhere a tutorial on VB and thats why i dont want it(Gona FreeZe ,lol).
3.I just want to make a server which i start on my desktop icon and it load’s i type User and Pass ,login and play…Dont want to change cursors,listen to music,change backgrounds or something just the normal’est client you have ever seen…

Read full topic
